sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
Install zig, or zig-nightly-binAUR for the latest development version.

zls provides the Zig Language Server, a Language Server Protocol implementation.

sections.title: Zig Build System
sections.content: The Zig Build System provides a cross-platform, dependency-free way to declare the logic required to build a project. See [1].

sections.title: Cross compiling
sections.content: See [2]. For the latest list of supported targets, see [3].
